files.README.md:
# OrchestKit ### Stop explaining your stack. Start shipping. **196 skills Â· 35 agents Â· 120 hooks Â· 33 plugins** [![Claude Code](https://img.shields.io/badge/Claude_Code-â‰¥2.1.27-7C3AED?style=for-the-badge&logo=anthropic)](https://claude.ai/claude-code) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow?style=for-the-badge)](./LICENSE) [![GitHub Stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/yonatangross/orchestkit?style=for-the-badge&logo=github)](https://github.com/yonatangross/orchestkit)
---


ðŸŽ® Explore the Playgrounds â†’
Interactive marketplace, demo gallery, setup wizard

--- ## Quick Start ```bash /plugin marketplace add yonatangross/orchestkit /plugin install ork /ork:doctor ``` **That's it.** Skills auto-activate. Hooks protect automatically. --- ## Why OrchestKit? Every Claude Code session starts from zero. You explain your stack, patterns, preferencesâ€”again and again. OrchestKit gives Claude **persistent knowledge** of production patterns that work automatically: | Without | With OrchestKit | |---------|-----------------| | "Use FastAPI with async SQLAlchemy 2.0..." | "Create an API endpoint" â†’ Done right | | "Remember cursor pagination, not offset..." | Agents know your patterns | | "Don't commit to main branch..." | Hooks block bad commits | | "Run tests before committing..." | `/ork:commit` runs tests for you | --- ## What You Get | Component | Count | Examples | |-----------|-------|----------| | **Skills** | 196 | RAG patterns, FastAPI, React 19, testing, security | | **Agents** | 35 | backend-architect, frontend-dev, security-auditor | | **Hooks** | 120 | Pre-commit checks, git protection, quality gates | | **Plugins** | 33 | Mix and match: `ork-rag`, `ork-fastapi`, `ork-react` | **[Browse everything in the Playgrounds â†’](https://orchestkit.vercel.app/marketplace-explorer.html)** --- ## Key Commands ```bash /ork:implement # Full-stack implementation with parallel agents /ork:verify # 6 agents validate your feature /ork:commit # Conventional commit with pre-checks /ork:explore # Analyze unfamiliar codebase /ork:remember # Save to persistent memory /ork:doctor # Health check ``` --- ## Install Options ```bash # Full toolkit (recommended) /plugin install ork # Or pick domains /plugin install ork-rag # RAG & retrieval /plugin install ork-fastapi # FastAPI backend /plugin install ork-react # React frontend /plugin install ork-testing # Testing patterns ``` **[Setup Wizard â†’](https://orchestkit.vercel.app/setup-wizard.html)** helps you pick the right plugins. --- ## Configuration ### Optional MCP Servers ```bash /ork:configure ``` | Server | Purpose | |--------|---------| | Context7 | Up-to-date library docs | | Memory | Knowledge graph | | Mem0 | Semantic search (needs API key) | ### Environment ```bash CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR # Your project MEM0_API_KEY # Optional: Mem0 cloud ``` --- ## FAQ
Plugin not found? ```bash /plugin list /plugin uninstall ork && /plugin install ork ```
Hooks not firing? Run `/ork:doctor` to diagnose.
Claude Code version? Requires **â‰¥2.1.27**. Check with `claude --version`.
--- ## Development ```bash npm run build # Build plugins from src/ npm test # Run all tests ``` Edit `src/` and `manifests/`, never `plugins/` (generated). See [CONTRIBUTING.md](./CONTRIBUTING.md) for details. --- ## What's New **v5.6.0** â€” Memory system improvements, graph visualization, queue recovery - 120 TypeScript hooks (92 global + 28 agent-scoped) - Interactive [Playgrounds](https://orchestkit.vercel.app/) - Fire-and-forget hook dispatchers [Full Changelog â†’](./CHANGELOG.md) ---
**[Playgrounds](https://orchestkit.vercel.app/)** Â· **[Issues](https://github.com/yonatangross/orchestkit/issues)** Â· **[Discussions](https://github.com/yonatangross/orchestkit/discussions)** MIT License Â· [@yonatangross](https://github.com/yonatangross)

plugins.name: ork-core
plugins.description: Core OrchestKit foundation â€” essential skills, agents, and hooks. Context engineering, architecture decisions, project structure. Required for all other OrchestKit plugins.

plugins.name: ork-memory-graph
plugins.description: Knowledge graph memory â€” zero-config, always works. Graph-first architecture with remember, recall, and session context loading.

plugins.name: ork-memory-mem0
plugins.description: Mem0 cloud memory â€” semantic search, cross-session sync, analytics. Requires MEM0_API_KEY. Depends on ork-memory-graph.

plugins.name: ork-memory-fabric
plugins.description: Memory orchestration â€” parallel query dispatch, cross-reference boosting, deduplication across graph and mem0. Depends on ork-memory-graph.

plugins.name: ork-rag
plugins.description: RAG & Retrieval â€” retrieval, embeddings, contextual, HyDE, reranking, query-decomposition, agentic-rag, multimodal-rag, pgvector-search, semantic-caching

plugins.name: ork-langgraph
plugins.description: LangGraph & Agent Orchestration â€” state, routing, parallel, checkpoints, functional, supervisor, human-in-loop, multi-agent, agent-loops, frameworks, temporal

plugins.name: ork-llm
plugins.description: LLM Patterns â€” function-calling, prompt-engineering, streaming, testing, safety, caching, fine-tuning, vision, audio, inference, ollama

plugins.name: ork-ai-observability
plugins.description: AI Observability â€” langfuse-observability, cache-cost-tracking, evidence-verification

plugins.name: ork-evaluation
plugins.description: Evaluation patterns â€” llm-evaluation, golden-dataset-curation, golden-dataset-management, golden-dataset-validation, add-golden

plugins.name: ork-product
plugins.description: Product Management agents â€” product-strategist, business-case-builder, prioritization-analyst, market-intelligence

plugins.name: ork-api
plugins.description: API Design â€” FastAPI, GraphQL (Strawberry), REST patterns, streaming, versioning, rate-limiting, error-handling

plugins.name: ork-database
plugins.description: Database patterns â€” sqlalchemy-2-async, alembic-migrations, database-schema-designer, database-versioning, zero-downtime-migration, connection-pooling

plugins.name: ork-async
plugins.description: Async & Tasks â€” asyncio-advanced, background-jobs, celery-advanced, distributed-locks, resilience-patterns

plugins.name: ork-backend-patterns
plugins.description: Backend Architecture â€” clean-architecture, DDD, CQRS, event-sourcing, sagas, aggregates, outbox, idempotency, caching, gRPC

plugins.name: ork-react-core
plugins.description: React Core patterns â€” react-server-components-framework, form-state-patterns, zustand-patterns, tanstack-query-advanced, react-aria-patterns, type-safety-validation

plugins.name: ork-ui-design
plugins.description: UI & Design patterns â€” design-system-starter, shadcn-patterns, radix-primitives, motion-animation-patterns, i18n-date-patterns

plugins.name: ork-frontend
plugins.description: Frontend Patterns â€” PWA, view-transitions, scroll-animations, responsive, dashboard, performance, render, lazy-loading, image-optimization, core-web-vitals, vite

plugins.name: ork-testing
plugins.description: Testing â€” unit, integration, property-based, e2e, webapp, MSW, VCR, contract, test-data, standards, pytest

plugins.name: ork-security
plugins.description: Security patterns â€” owasp-top-10, auth-patterns, input-validation, defense-in-depth, security-scanning, advanced-guardrails

plugins.name: ork-devops
plugins.description: DevOps & Infrastructure â€” deployment, monitoring, performance-testing, release-management, github-operations, edge-computing

plugins.name: ork-git
plugins.description: Git/GitHub patterns â€” git-workflow, git-recovery-command, create-pr, fix-issue, issue-progress-tracking, stacked-prs

plugins.name: ork-accessibility
plugins.description: Accessibility patterns â€” wcag-compliance, a11y-testing, focus-management

plugins.name: ork-workflows
plugins.description: Workflows â€” implement, explore, verify, review-pr, code-review-playbook, skill-evolution, feedback, worktree-coordination

plugins.name: ork-mcp
plugins.description: MCP Integration â€” mcp-server-building, mcp-advanced-patterns, mcp-security-hardening, agent-browser, browser-content-capture

plugins.name: ork-video
plugins.description: Video & Demo Production â€” demo-producer, remotion, manim, terminal-recording, storyboarding, narration, HeyGen avatars, audio mixing

plugins.name: ork
plugins.description: Complete AI development toolkit with 196 skills covering AI/LLM, backend, frontend, security, and testing patterns. Includes 35 specialized agents and 120 lifecycle hooks.
